interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: RUNATURE Remy U Tip Hair Extensions Golden Blonde Highlight Light Blonde U Tip Real Human Hair Extensions Straight Pre Bonded utips Hair Extensions Human Hair 20 Inch 50g
Review Date: 2022/03/12
Store: RUNATURE
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'RUNATURE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 4.76 x 1.61 inches; 4.69 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have been purchasing and wearing this manufacturer’s tape-in extensions for over two years. I have switched to keratin glue ins and wanted the same color. I was thrilled to find the same manufacturer offered my color in keratin glue-ins. They’re staying in and look awesome!
Review Title: Extremely Thin with Shredded Ends
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
7 Wonders Nourishing Leave In Conditioner with Pure Organic Oils of Almond, Marula, Argan, Olive, Macadamia, Coconut & Jojoba 16.9 fl. Oz. Frulatte {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 3.86 x 2.8 inches; 1.23 Pounds'} I first found this product at a discount store. And I’m thrilled to find that Amazon has it so I can never be without it! I have waist-length hair that is kinky curly with gray hair throughout that I wear straightened. This product is the only one that keeps my hair from frizzing no matter how hot and humid it gets! And the shine and softness of my hair is the best it’s ever been. I use it after using It’s A Ten Miracle Silk Leave-In after washing my hair with Wen.

Even if you have long hair, use this stuff sparingly and make sure you liquify it in the palms of your hand and between your fingers before you put it through your hair.

Another plus: the huge bottle lasts me about 6 months. Keep in mind my hair is dry so I only wash it twice a week. Knowing that, you can gauge how long this bottle will last you. Best Anti-Frizz Hair Product I’ve Ever Used FESHFEN Straight Long Ponytail Extensions 24 Inch Wrap Around Synthetic Hair Piece Magic Paste Pony Tail Hair Extensions Hairpieces for Women Girls FESHFEN {'Brand': 'FESHFEN', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '14.96 x 3.58 x 0.75 inches; 5.19 Ounces'} Difficult to get the hair ‘wrap’ wrapped around my own ponytail because the Velcro sticks to the fake hair. Also is too heavy so is slides down your own ponytail. Doesn’t stay on! YoungSee 20" Remy Tape in Hair Extensions Ombre Balayage Medium Brown with Bleach Blonde 100% Real Human Hair Seamless Tape in Human Hair Extensions 50g 20pcs YoungSee {'Brand': 'YoungSee', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 1 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '786784875194'} I was so disappointed when I open the package. The top of the Wests are almost black. They are not a medium brown at all. Unfortunately I open the package too late to be able to return them. I’m keeping the box to remind myself never to buy from them again.

UPDATE: They also mat horribly! DON’T BUY -Tops are Black,NOT Brown VeSunny 20Inch Balayage Tape in Hair Extensions Remi Human Hair Brazilian Remy Hair Invisible Tape Ombre #4 Dark Brown to Caramel Blonde Mixed Platinum Blonde Human Hair Tape in Extensions 20pc 50g Ve Sunny {'Brand': 'Ve Sunny', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '20 x 0.98 x 0.98 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '798863462690'} These extensions are NOT Remy! You can’t call this remy hair if the cuticles are not all going in the same direction. And miss-matched cuticles cause matting at the tape. While sitting and watching TV not moving my head, they all matted up at the tape! Now I have to take them all out! NOT REMY HAIR-They all may up at the tapes! Human Hair Extensions Tape in 50g Golden Blonde Highlighted With Light Blonde Tape in Hair Extensions 20 Inches Tape Extensions RUNATURE {'Brand': 'RUNATURE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 4.65 x 1.77 inches; 5.36 Ounces'} The first set I purchased matted several times a day no matter how often I oiled them. They matted within 10-15 minutes after brushing, even when I sat still and didn’t move my head. I contacted the company, and they were very helpful. They offered to replace the extensions with new ones! Now that’s Customer Service! I look forward to receiving my replacement extensions. Great Customer Service! Vario Tape In Human Hair Extensions 7A Silky Straight Skin Weft Human Remy Hair For Fashion Women (22 Inche 60g 20PCS #12P613) VARIO {'Brand': 'VARIO', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Product Dimensions': '22 x 2 x 0.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '610877854301'} Beautiful hair, match my color perfectly. Beautiful hair RUNATURE Mini Tape Hair Extensions Human Hair 20 Inch Remy Hair Tape ins Extensions Chestnut Brown Highlighted Blonde Human Hair Tape Extensions Real Hair 20g RUNATURE {'Brand': 'RUNATURE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No'} Colors are nice, I love the size so I can fill in smaller areas. BUT their tapes don’t stick to each other!! And the defective tape is so stuck onto each weft that it took forever to peel them off so I could put working tapes on them. Very Frustrating!!! Tapes Defective! RUNATURE Remy U Tip Hair Extensions Golden Blonde Highlight Light Blonde U Tip Real Human Hair Extensions Straight Pre Bonded utips Hair Extensions Human Hair 20 Inch 50g RUNATURE {'Brand': 'RUNATURE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 4.76 x 1.61 inches; 4.69 Ounces'} I have been purchasing and wearing this manufacturer’s tape-in extensions for over two years. I have switched to keratin glue ins and wanted the same color. I was thrilled to find the same manufacturer offered my color in keratin glue-ins. They’re staying in and look awesome!
